info.title: Submission Form #{{3.`1`}}
info.description: Please submit the next delivery of the piece here. Only upload up to three images per submission.

spec.help: Whether the option is `other`. Currently only applies to `Radio` and `Checkbox` choice types.
spec.name: isOther
spec.label: Is Other

spec.help: You can only provide either `Go To Action` or `Go To Section ID` but not both. Either all or no options must be go to enabled.
spec.name: goToAction
spec.label: Go To Action

spec.help: You can only provide either `Go To Action` or `Go To Section ID` but not both. Either all or no options must be go to enabled.
spec.name: goToSectionId
spec.label: Go To Section ID

nested.help: Whether the question is a paragraph question or not. If not, the question is a short text question.
nested.name: paragraph
nested.label: Paragraph

nested.help: The lowest possible value for the scale.
nested.name: low
nested.label: Low

nested.help: The highest possible value for the scale.
nested.name: high
nested.label: High

nested.help: Whether to include the time as part of the question.
nested.name: includeTime
nested.label: Include Time

nested.help: Whether to include the year as part of the question.
nested.name: includeYear
nested.label: Include Year

nested.help: `Yes` if the question is about an elapsed time. Otherwise it is about a time of day.
nested.name: duration
nested.label: Duration

spec.help: If not provided, a new ID is assigned.
spec.name: questionId
spec.label: Question ID

spec.help: The maximum number of points a respondent can automatically get for a correct answer.
spec.name: pointValue
spec.label: Point Value

spec.help: Correct answers may only be specified for `Text`, `Checkbox`, `Radio`, and `Drop Down` questions.
spec.name: answers
spec.label: Answers

nested.help: The title for the single row in the `Question Group Item`.
nested.name: title
nested.label: Row Title

spec.help: The maximum number of points a respondent can automatically get for a correct answer.
spec.name: pointValue
spec.label: Point Value

nested.help: When grid is set, all questions in the group must be of kind `row`.
nested.name: grid
nested.label: Grid

designer.name: Update Task - Move to General Claim

mapper.html:
Hey {{3.`2`}},

This is just a quick update to let you know that we have officially received your the requirements for your custom artwork!

We're assigning the work to a member of our team and will be in touch with the first sketch soon.

Thanks again for your business!

Best,
Adam
mapper.subject: Order #{{3.`1`}} Requirements Received!

expect.name: from
expect.label: Enter a Spreadsheet ID and Sheet Name

mapper.comment_text:
@{{35.username}} - order available from return client. 

To let others claim - move it to the release status

To claim the piece yourself, please move it to the claim status, or comment "Claim"

The contract will automatically be released in 24 hours.

designer.name: Post Comment for Return Client Claiming
